public class ResponseController
extends java.lang.Object

  • Method Details

    • getResponseById

      @GetMapping("/getResponseById/{responseId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<GetResponseResponse> getResponseById​(@PathVariable("responseId") java.lang.Long id)
      Finds response in the database by id
      Parameters:
      id - id of the response to find in database
      Returns:
      if response exists returns GetResponseResponse object | if response does not exist returns ResponseEntity.notFound()

    • getResponsedIds

      @GetMapping("/getResponsesIds") public GetResponsesResponse getResponsedIds()
      Finds all ids of responses in the database
      Returns:
      all Ids of responses from the database

    • getResponseByRequestId

      @GetMapping("/getResponseByRequestId/{requestId}") public GetResponseByRequestId getResponseByRequestId​(@PathVariable("requestId") java.lang.Long id)
      Finds all responses with Response.requestId=id
      Parameters:
      id - id to search responses table for
      Returns:
      GetResponseByRequestId Object

    • createResponse

      @PostMapping("/createResponse") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.Void> createResponse​(@RequestBody PostResponseResponse request)
      Creates new Response object on the database (adds new response to the database)
      Parameters:
      request - PostResponseResponse Object
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity.notFound().build() if Response already exists or request with such requestId does not exist | ResponseEntity.ok() on success

    • updateResponse

      @PutMapping("/updateResponse") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.Void> updateResponse​(@RequestBody PostResponseResponse request)
      Updates Existing Response object on the database (adds new response to the database)
      Parameters:
      request - PostResponseResponse Object
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity.notFound() if response does not exist or if request with provided requestId does not exist | ResponseEntity.ok() on success

    • deleteResponse

      @DeleteMapping("/deleteResponse/responseId") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.Void> deleteResponse​(@PathVariable("responseId") java.lang.Long id)
      Removes Response entity with specified id from the database
      Parameters:
      id - id of the Response entity to remove
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity.notFound() if entity with specified id does not exist | ResponseEntity.ok() on success
